channel.title: Nitin Rajkumar on Incubyte Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Nitin Rajkumar on Incubyte Blog

item.title: Dynamic method in ruby
item.description: In Ruby, the dynamic nature of method dispatch is one of its key features.

item.title: Monkey Patching in Ruby
item.description: Ruby, as you all know, is a dynamic programming language that provides the ability and hence freedom to reopen the existing classes and change their behavior during runtime by adding new methods or modifying existing methods.

item.title: Origins of Graphql
item.description: Königsberg Bridge Problem — The Big Bang of GraphQL “Starting from any of the four land areas A, B, C, D is it possible to cross each of the seven bridges exactly once and come back to the starting point without swimming across the river?

item.title: Rails RESTful API, Outside in TDD
item.description: There is always a disciplined way to do things I was waiting for the coffee dispenser to finish filling up my cup and my mind started wandering.
